settings.title: Blue Willow
settings.text: Classic, collectible, and a Susan Shaw original: a brand-new collection inspired by one of our favorite pieces from the china cabinet is here. We are thrilled to introduce Blue Willow, inspired by the centuries-old elegance of the Blue Willow pattern and the story behind it. The Blue Willow design is based on the story of forbidden lovers who are reincarnated as doves to fly alongside the willow tree.

Our pendant interpretation features all of the storytelling elements of the timeless Blue Willow design. The Blue Willow collection is available in limited quantities, so don't wait to add one of these elegant new releases to your Susan Shaw collection.

settings.title: The Blue Willow Story
settings.content: The Blue Willow design tells an ancient Chinese story about a part of forbidden lovers. As legend has it, a wealthy and powerful merchant resided in an exquisite pagoda situated between a pine tree and a bridge with his beautiful daughter. The merchant pledged his daughter's hand in marriage to a wealthy businessman - however, unbeknownst to him, his daughter fell in love with a poor yet handsome clerk

The father was furious about their secret relationship, and vowed to force his daughter to marry the wealthy businessman instead. He locked his daughter up to keep her away from her forbidden lover, but the pair escaped, and took off by sea with plans to elope.

Determined to follow through with his daughter's original marriage plans, the father chased after them by boat. Just as he was about to catch them, the pair of lovers were transformed into doves by the gods. In their new form, they could fly amongst the willow trees and finally be together in peace.

You can find each element of this story carefully designed into our new pendant, making it the perfect gift for a collector, newlywed or bride-to-be. Don't miss out on the chance to add a touch of Blue Willow and its timeless elegance to your jewelry box.
